intro: When Alice Asher is murdered in Andover, Hercule Poirot is already on to the clues. Alphabetically speaking, it's one down, twenty-five to go.

intro: The New York Times bestselling Freakonomics changed the way we see the world, exposing the hidden side of just about everything.

intro: The next book of Harari after his Sapiens.

intro: Go through the history of human from the first individuals to walk the earth to the radical.

title: Tâm nguyện cuối cùng

intro: The newest detective novel from Mi Lei. This time, he focused heavily on the stories of each character. There are still twists but they're quite easy to guess.

title: Hiệu ứng chim mồi
author: Quốc Khánh, Hạo Nhiên
intro: With a simple and witty writing style, the authors show us some useful psychological techniques for business.

intro: An awesome adventure of Charrière when he tried to escape from all prisons he is confined.
